dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: nopiracy [mailto:nopiracy@advfilms.com] 
Sent: Thursday, February 15, 2007 3:32 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) Notice of Copyright Infringement
RE: http://realitylapse.com IP Address: 70.85.183.154 

February 15, 2007
 
ThePlanet.com
copyright@theplanet.com
 
Sent via email
Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA)
Notice of Copyright Infringement
 
RE: http://realitylapse.com
IP Address: 70.85.183.154   (ARIN & RIPE IP search)
 
Dear ThePlanet.com:
 
I, Long Thai, Anti-Piracy Team Member of A.D. Vision, Inc. (ADV), certify
under penalty of perjury, that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of
the owner of certain intellectual property rights.
 
I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below are not
authorized by law for use by the above named domain name owner or their
agents and therefore infringes the copyright owner's rights. Please act
expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed
to be infringing.
 
A webpage designated as http://realitylapse.com infringes upon A.D. Vision
Inc.
